channel.title: I cant trade as an owner in my rsps
channel.description: Ok so I have been playing in my rsps, and I have noticed that when I trade my players or staff the trade box never comes up and it doesnt have a system message. How do I fix this to where owners can trade too? Thanks and need help

item.title: I cant trade as an owner in my rsps
item.dc:creator: @Strong_Tips Strong Tips
item.description:
@Strong_Tips wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:12, topic:376627”][quote author=Mutant138 link=topic=472550.msg3691708#msg3691708 date=1312162872]

Does it send some sort of message. like “owners cannot trade” or somethin like that

he’s right… look for a message related or even similar to “Admins can’t trade: false;”
[/quote]
it’d be Admins can trade: false
just saying.[/quote]
I know this is old, but this is what I had to do on my delta source.

Go to your client.java (source sided) and search:

Staff Member's can not trade.

If this doesn’t work go to line 34071 (34071 is the line in Notepad++).

Delete

if(other.playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3){ sM("Staff Member's cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2 || playerRights == 3){ sM("Staff Member's cannot trade."); return; }

Then it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant trade as an owner in my rsps

item.title: I cant trade as an owner in my rsps

Does it send some sort of message. like “owners cannot trade” or somethin like that
[/quote]
he’s right… look for a message related or even similar to “Admins can’t trade: false;”[/quote]
it’d be Admins can trade: false
just saying.
